statements: SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_photos;
SELECT photo_name, upload_date FROM digital_nomads_photos WHERE photographer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT location, category FROM digital_nomads_photos WHERE upload_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT photographer_name, COUNT(*) AS photo_count FROM digital_nomads_photos GROUP BY photographer_name;
SELECT photo_name, location, category FROM digital_nomads_photos ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_photos WHERE category = 'landscape';
SELECT photo_name, photographer_name, upload_date FROM digital_nomads_photos ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM digital_nomads_photos WHERE photographer_name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT photo_name, location FROM digital_nomads_photos WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_photos FROM digital_nomads_photos GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, traveler_location FROM Travelers;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_location, traveler_id FROM Travelers;
SELECT * FROM Travelers;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name FROM Travelers WHERE traveler_location='Paris';
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_location FROM Travelers ORDER BY traveler_id DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_location FROM Travelers;
SELECT * FROM TravelMedia WHERE media_type='photo';
SELECT traveler_name, media_url FROM Travelers JOIN TravelMedia ON Travelers.traveler_id = TravelMedia.traveler_id;
SELECT traveler_name, COUNT(media_id) as total_media FROM Travelers JOIN TravelMedia ON Travelers.traveler_id = TravelMedia.traveler_id GROUP BY traveler_name;
SELECT traveler_name, media_date FROM Travelers LEFT JOIN TravelMedia ON Travelers.traveler_id = TravelMedia.traveler_id ORDER BY media_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Photos
SELECT name, location FROM Photos WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, name, location, date_taken FROM Photos ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, location FROM Videos WHERE duration > 60
SELECT * FROM Tags
SELECT id, name, location, date_taken FROM Photos WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, location FROM Photos WHERE date_taken >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Photos ORDER BY date_taken DESC
SELECT name, location, duration FROM Videos WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT name, id FROM Tags WHERE name LIKE '%vacation%'
SELECT * FROM photos;
SELECT photo_title, location FROM photos WHERE date_taken > '2021-01-01';
SELECT photo_title, location FROM photos ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id = 3;
SELECT video_title, date_recorded FROM videos WHERE location LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT * FROM photos;
SELECT photo_title, location FROM photos WHERE date_taken >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT photo_id, photo_title, location, date_taken FROM photos WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date_taken DESC;
SELECT p.photo_id, p.photo_title, t.tag_name FROM photos p JOIN photo_tags pt ON p.photo_id = pt.photo_id JOIN tags t ON pt.tag_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT p.photo_title, t.tag_name FROM photos p JOIN photo_tags pt ON p.photo_id = pt.photo_id JOIN tags t ON pt.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'nature';
SELECT * FROM photos;
SELECT photo_name, location FROM photos ORDER BY photo_name desc;
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY population desc;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT video_name, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 60 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM photos WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT photo_name, description FROM photos WHERE taken_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT video_name, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY video_name ASC;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2021-01-01';
